target-enhancements.options.neutral-colo: Border color of neutral enemies when you hold ALT or mouseover their tokens
target-enhancements.options.hostile-colo: Border color of hostile enemies when you hold ALT or mouseover their tokens
target-enhancements.options.enable-color: Enables a set of features to help those who are colorblind
target-enhancements.options.ReleaseBehav: This setting determines how easy target behaves when clicking multiple tokens. 'Sticky' mode will target each clicked token without un-targeting anything, and you must click a token again to un-target it. 'Standard' mode more closely matches the standard foundry behaviour where all previous tokens are automatically un-targeted when clicking a new token, and you must hold Shift while clicking in order to target multiple tokens.
